Interface CanvasViewerController

All Superinterfaces:
Observable
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimulatorController
public interface CanvasViewerController extends Observable
Represents the controller used by the canvas viewer to obtain the canvas model data and to control the figures animation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Canvas
    getCanvas()
    Returns the canvas model associated with this controller.
    CanvasPersistenceManager
    getPersistenceManager()
    Returns the persistence manager to be used to persist this canvas model into a data store.
    boolean
    isAnimationRunning()
    States if the canvas model associated with this controller is being animated or not.
    void
    setCanvas(Canvas canvasModel)
    Sets the canvas model of this controller.
    void
    startAnimation()
    Starts the animation of the canvas model associated with this controller.
    void
    stopAnimation()
    Stops the animation of the canvas model associated with this controller.

    Methods inherited from interface fr.tp.inf112.projects.canvas.controller.Observable

    addObserver, removeObserver

  • Method Details

    • getCanvas

      Canvas getCanvas()
      Returns the canvas model associated with this controller.
      Returns:
      A non null Canvas object.

    • setCanvas

      void setCanvas(Canvas canvasModel)
      Sets the canvas model of this controller. Invoked when users open an existing model from the canvas viewer.
      Parameters:
      canvasModel - A non null Canvas object.

    • getPersistenceManager

      CanvasPersistenceManager getPersistenceManager()
      Returns the persistence manager to be used to persist this canvas model into a data store.
      Returns:
      A non null CanvasPersistenceManager implementation for the desired data storage kind (file, database, etc.).

    • startAnimation

      void startAnimation()
      Starts the animation of the canvas model associated with this controller. For example, moving, resizing, adding or removing figures.

    • stopAnimation

      void stopAnimation()
      Stops the animation of the canvas model associated with this controller.

    • isAnimationRunning

      boolean isAnimationRunning()
      States if the canvas model associated with this controller is being animated or not.
      Returns:
      A boolean stating if the canvas is being animated or not.
